 2012-07032012-05-31CIC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment, effective July 3, 2012, of RUTH DELISLE of Saint-Laurent, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour until March 31, 2013 or until the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act, whichever is earlier.
